# Sketch {.unnumbered}

```{r}
library(readr)
march_madness <- read_csv("538 Ratings.csv")
View(march_madness)

```
```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
march_madness |>
  str()
```
```{r}
march_madness |>
  ggplot(aes(x = `POWER RATING`)) +
  geom_density()
```
```{r}
march_madness |>
  filter(TEAM =="Duke") |>
  ggplot(aes(x = YEAR, y = SEED)) +
  geom_point()
```


```{r}
uconn <- march_madness|>
  filter(TEAM == "Connecticut")

uconn |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = YEAR, y = ROUND)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()
```
```{r}
 march_madness_new <- march_madness |>
  mutate(SEED = as.character(SEED))

march_madness_new <- march_madness_new|>
full_join(cbb)
```

  
```{r}
march_madness |>
  ggplot(aes(x = ROUND, fill = "SEED")) +
  geom_bar()
